name: Soft Sucker of Octopus
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
It modifies the user's resistance to asphyxiation.
